website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality closet organizer is perfect for people looking for a durable product.
pros: Neutral tan color fits most home decor
Top hanger made of hook and loop closure to fit bars of all shapes and sizes
Foldable for when it needs to be put away
cons: Buyers wish the organizers held more

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for organizing. I bought 2 for my baby sons room for blankets and diapers and they work perfect. They can hold quite a bit of weight. I wish i bought more for other uses! I will definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Is EVERYTHING made small in China?
customer_reviews.text: So much smaller than you’d think 🤔. Not possible to fit 2 shoes in each space (maybe flip flops) so only can hold 5 pairs of shoes, one shoe (size 12) per hole (see pic). Only good part is velcro flap that attaches to clothes bar works great, better than using goofy metal hooks.
customer_reviews.author: mark78734

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoe holder
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I can’t believe the quality of this material. Most are so thin you can rip it. This is so sturdy and the Velcro closure in top is VERY secure. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: The real Nickie Penn

customer_reviews.title: A real need met
customer_reviews.text: I have shoes, most women do and I have shoes under the bed, along side of the bed, and in a shoe cupboard. My husband has complained that I have too many and he is tired of tripping over them so I bought this wonder shoe holder that I put in my closet and it is perfect. The shoes are right there when I need them, no more shoes on floor and Husband is happy. Very good quality, easy to install, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: julier

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy storage solution
customer_reviews.text: This solved my sweater storage problem. I can store about 3 sweaters in each compartment, saving space in my dresser drawers and keeping my sweaters nicely folded. The velcro fastening on top is much sturdier than I expected. I have it stuffed full and it doesn't budge. Seems very sturdy in general.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for extra storage options
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. My apartment lacks a hall closet to keep towels and sheets. Instead I have a storage room where pretty much everything goes. I purchased two of these - one for towels and the other for bedding. The velcro is very strong as I have a lot of towels, wash cloths, etc. The size of each compartment is decent. For the way I'm using them, the size could be bigger. But for shirts, pants and other clothing items these are solid options for storage.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: A Total Win!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that this was delivered in under 24 hours, it went beyond my expectations! Holds 10 pairs of flats and sandals easily and takes up no space in my closet! My shoes were ridiculously vomiting on my closet floor and in less than 5 minutes made all the difference in the world. I got the natural and it is well made and attractive. Very happy. Size 8 women's shoes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harriette Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I found this hanging shoe organizer to be a great way to store my shoes. It takes up very little room in my closet, holds ten pairs of shoes so that they are visible and it is easy to locate the pair that I want to wear. They are protected from dust, also. The organizer attaches to the bar in my closet easily and is held securely with a velcro closure. I am considering buying a second one for my condo in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Two units fit pefectly in my coat closet.
customer_reviews.text: Material is sturdy and the free floating sewn in boards allow you to achieve a perfect balance within each compartment. This unit has velcro instead of hanging devices but it seems to have strong holding power without any issues over the past 7 days. This worked for me as my three chest of drawers are full. Great organizing and tidy up tool hidden and easily accessible in my coat closet.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by Durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few months ago, and I’m surprised at how durable it is. I had to buy one because my last shoe holder tore. I have multiple pairs of running shoes shoved in this shoe holder, and I use it every day. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Leeper

customer_reviews.title: No more tripping over sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. Sturdy material and doesn't take up much space in the closet. The spaces are big enough for one men's shoe (in my case). Nice to get shoes off the floor and somewhere organized.
customer_reviews.author: Thirdnewt

customer_reviews.title: Great For RVs With Limited Drawer Space
customer_reviews.text: Great for hanging in RV closets in the smaller RVs that don't have any drawer space. I have it hanging in my RV at hunting camp and use it for my socks, underwear, tee shirts, belts, etc., with room to spare on the hanger for a couple of shirts and slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Cloer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful space saver.
customer_reviews.text: Works, very, well, for us. We have limited closet space; however, my wife has an UNlimited appetite, for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lavin

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but shelves may need reinforcing.
customer_reviews.text: Product info on sizing is correct, however shelves 1, 2, 3 and 4 are inset at only 10.5". Additionally, on those same shelves, only 7.5" are reinforced with cardboard (3" to back is only fabric). I may go to the $ store and buy foam board to reinforce those shelves. It is made of a durable fabric, but is not canvas. Wish the drawers that can be used with this product were available separately.
customer_reviews.author: imausr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: The velcro tab is strong so the shoe organizer stays in place. Fits my flats and sneakers with no problem (size women 8). The bulkier shoes, platform, wedges and chunky high heels will probably not fit in one compartment. It worked well for my needs. I used two and now 20 pairs of shoes are off the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Samwise

customer_reviews.title: Solid build quality, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be a little cheaper in quality because of the price but I was pleasantly surprised that it's relatively sturdy. The velcro that attaches to the clothes rack is strong and I have some pretty heavy shoes on. I have a small closet and I regret not buying this earlier, it allowed me to clear up some additional space on the floor of the closet.
customer_reviews.author: J Berg

customer_reviews.title: Love it and will be buying two more !
customer_reviews.text: High quality and does fit my size 12 men shoes and you can fit 2 flip flop pairs per slot. Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: REGG

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I use one in my own closet and keep all my hats and scarves and gloves in them...I may store the winter stuff and change it out to bathing suits and t shirts if it ever warms up here-I also have one in the guest room closet- guests love it bc I put fresh towels in there and guests can put their own clothes in there as well for their stay.
customer_reviews.author: Grita

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received it... I put it up (simple) put my shoes in it.... Went online and ordered another one! Shoes off floor & it looks good!! It's nice & sturdy. Wish I'd bought this a long time ago! I'm very happy with this product. No hesitation recommending it as far as I'm concerned!
customer_reviews.author: P.L.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: At first I gave this a 4 Star review, but after only a couple of months, the grommets that hold the hanging strap have broken off. I am so disappointed, as I really needed this for my shorts. Originally, this was my only complaint: If the wells were deeper, it would be perfect. Now, I have to go and buy another one, but I won't buy the same company as, apparently, these are cheaply made. So sad. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing shoes and other items
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these organizers. The second one I ordered was defective, but the company cheerfully replaced it without charges.
customer_reviews.author: Montekat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly sturdy for the price. I was worried Velcro wouldn’t hold with heavy shoes but its pretty heavy duty and seems to be working fine. The cubbies are plenty tall in my opinion but even a inch or two wider would be a smidge more ideal
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe storage to add to other ones I already have. Sturdy and well made. The only thing that could be improved is to make each space a little wider to accommodate a bulkier pair of shoes. Its good for sandals & dress shoes but if you want to store sneakers you can only fit one in each space. I prefer to store one pair in each space.
customer_reviews.author: A. Liegl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Closet Organizers
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and attractive. It holds shoes in a manner that keeps them easy to see and access, and keeps the floor clutter free. Each opening is large enough to fit 1 pair of smaller shoes (up to maybe a women's size 9), or for large men's shoes, one shoe per opening. I bought two units which are side by side, which allows for the larger men's shoes to be side by side. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: PapaZhan

customer_reviews.title: Who'd-a Thunk It?
customer_reviews.text: Who'd-a thunk it? What a fabulous idea for those summer tennis and golf shoes, kick-ons and skids. I had never considered anything other than putting shoes on floor-based models of a shoe rack, but this is wonderfully wild and takes up so little space I'm absolutely delighted with it. The velcro that holds the top over the closet bar is firm and the unit was extremely easy to put in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sputz

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible design. It uses 3 rivets to hold it to the strap that goes on the closet rod. First one broke within 2 days, and it was not even full of clothes. It is a waste of money, avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Keli S. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: a That works perfect as
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our new granddaughter. We hung it in her closet and put all her little shoes in the slots and it works perfectly. We bought another one with little drawers in it & put all her hair pieces in them so they stay organized. a That works perfect as well
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Miklya

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to store her shoes she doesn't wear, in 2 months with just 3 pairs of shoes it broke. the top part came off and there is no way to reattach it. Now it's just garbage. As you can see in the pictures it hasn't suffered any wear and tear that would've caused this.
customer_reviews.author: Hotcatzrule

customer_reviews.title: Covered in Mold
customer_reviews.text: I can't use what I received because it is covered in mold. The mold is grown into the fabric, there's no cleaning it. Also, it appears like it was a return - odd stickers half attached in places, no tape on the packing materials, etc. Gross and inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Holds most of my shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe storage is very sturdy and holds regular shoes like tennis, flats, heels. There is no sag when filled with my shoes. It is not made for boots. It did help clean up my closet and all hanging in a compact area. I recommend for organization. It made a big difference in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: King Family

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. They had good reviews but already one of them has completely came apart. I have it holding toddler clothes in a closet and it’s not even nearly full. The screws have snapped off from where it holds on the bar in the closet. Very disappointed. I have ones that I’ve bought in the past with heavy shoes in them for years and they’re still holding. I just can’t remember where I bought those!
customer_reviews.author: JMihesan

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: The shoe organizer was easy to install. I'm 84 and 5 feet tall. I had it up in 5 minutes. It is well-made with strong grips. Best of all, the material is strong and durable. I highly recommend it. No more shoes on the floor. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Prof

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy shoe organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe organizer for my vacation home. It’s perfect for all my shoes. I wanted one that’s sturdy and won’t tear. I can put 2 pairs of flats in each slot. The velcro attachment is nice and strong. I have no worries with this organizer.
customer_reviews.author: TAK

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised - Teenagers May Struggle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, works as advertised. Teenage daughter struggles to get shoes in consistently, need to keep retraining her. It does help save money, clearly displaying shoes aids in effectively dismissing erroneous requests for additional pairs... Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Americano

customer_reviews.title: All in all, pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy enough and installs easy enough. The problem is capacity. I wear a size ten men's shoe. There is NO WAY that two will go into a compartment as shown in the pictures. Truthfully, it can be a little tight to get one in. Still, for the price, it's a good buy. I figured ahead of time that it would not hold two shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JLJr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing your closet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that will help me organize my cluttered closet. I stumbled upon this and decided to give it a try and see. I bought two instantly because I really need something that will store my socks, underwear, shorts, and miscellaneous stuff in my closet. This did the trick for me! It fits perfectly on the bottom hanging rack of my closet
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: This product is cheap and worthless in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: All that my wife hung in this simple closet cubby system was clothes. There is a section that wraps around the horizontal closet pole and there are miniature weak screws that connect it the cubes of cubby boxes below. The screws are too short and weak. They snapped and rendered the new closet system worthless within days of purchase. It was a total loss This product is worthless
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: AND he was delighted! I was hesitant because I feared the velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the sections aren't large enough to hold more than one of my hubby's shoes, this is has removed 5 pairs of shoes from the floor into a neat, organized spot, AND he was delighted! I was hesitant because I feared the velcro wouldn't hold, but it is very secure. A great product for $10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use to hang my t shirts but I noticed the necks were getting stretched out. Now I fold them and place them in this and i can still see them neat and organized. I might get another one for my sneakers and shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This works for me, but I wear a mens 13. To give reference, a normal pair of tennis shoes barely fit. Toe to heal with one of the shoes hanging out. Not optimal but works.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not for RV use I guess. Broke in 1 hour.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this two stars because the Velcro held. I put this in my camper to organize my closet. I only put three days worth of undergarments, shorts, and tank tops. Got to our destination and the part that holds the whole thing to the Velcro strap broke off. The clothes part was on the ground, Velcro part still attached to the bar. Got 1 hour use out of this product and sorry I purchased for my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Brasten

customer_reviews.title: Hangs askew
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this same item, same brand several years ago so my rating is based on comparison. The new one has the hangar velcro strip sewn on the unit so that the unit hangs askew instead of straight down. The individual shoe spaces tilt slightly upward. This isn't horrendous but it could be fixed by just centering the velcro strip segment at the top of the unit. Otherwise, I find the spaces just a wee bit smaller in dimension and the fabric just a bit less sturdy. Having said that, it does function.
customer_reviews.author: C K L

customer_reviews.title: Best way to store shoes in closet
customer_reviews.text: The devise is very sturdy and it connects to the rod with a very sturdy Velcro device so it can't swing back and forth when you access the shoes. It is nice looking and you don't have to mess around under your clothing trying to find the shoes on those metal racks that sit on the floor. My shoes fit into it nicely. I am going to buy another one because it is so effective and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me but I didn’t use shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to keep my handbags, umbrellas, travel pillows. The openings are narrow and probably will not hold 2 shoes easily but was perfect for my needs. It is made well for it’s price but consider the price. I like that it attaches with velcro but not sure how much weight it could sustain.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie15

customer_reviews.title: Closet organizer shelf
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one and saw my small closet could accommodate two so ordered another one. I am using for linens. Not large enough to handle king size quilt but nothing much is so those will need to go on wooden top shelf of other closet. Seem sturdy enough. Very strong Velcro at top. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a pair of Sperry Boat shoes in each pocket no problem
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering this product as reviews were split on the pocket size, but decided to take a chance. So glad I did. I can easily fit a pair of Sperry boat shoes, sneakers , or short heeled in each pocket. I wear a women's size 9 medium. Like the velcro pole holder which does the job far better than hooks. Will probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: very small and light
customer_reviews.text: size is small, can not fit my husband's sneakers , the price is higher for the quality and size, I will not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C

customer_reviews.title: Obviously too many sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Since i just received this item, I can hardly give an adequate review. I wear size 8.5 shoes, and my sneaker pairs are stuffed into the compartments. If the area were a mere two inches greater, I would be satisfied. Placing one shoe per compartment is ridiculous. But then, I obviously have too many sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: larabee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, material is strong and not flimsy which ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, material is strong and not flimsy which I’m happy about. There is Velcro at the top so you can hang it in your closet and it does stick very well I am not sure how much weight it will hold but but it is good quality and stitched very well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few months
customer_reviews.text: It holds a decent amount of shoes, was easy to put together, and I thought I had made a good purchase. THEN, five months after buying, it fell apart. The shoe holder itself snapping off the two little studs that attach it to the part that wraps around the closet bar. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, very minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product is wonderful and has made an enormous difference in my closet; however, I have 2 minor quips with it. 1. It is not very wide and so when you put a pair of shoes into it (at least my size 10s) you have to put the sideways and backwards (like when you're packing a suitcase). 2. If you push to hard on it while you're putting shoes into it, it will swing around the bar, but I guess that could just be my fault and the way I'm pushing the shoes into it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot better than I even expected. I was unsure at first if this would be up to the task because I had a similar product before and it arrived much smaller than in looked in the pictures. After actually hanging it up and using though, I have to admit that it worked like a damned charm and I am grateful. These guys have a winner with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is very helpful to keep my clothes organize for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very helpful to keep my clothes organize for the week especially in the morning and now that winter is coming I don't have to fuss about what to wear. I can put what I need for the week on the weekend and be all set all week.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Fi, NY

customer_reviews.title: Much !Smaller than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry that I followed suggestions from positive feedbacks. It's much smaller than advertised. You can fit only one pair of shoes in each cubby hole. Not at all what I was expecting. DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: AWK

customer_reviews.title: Easy, peasy!
customer_reviews.text: It completely filled the bill for me! I had shoes in shoe boxes and now I have them where I can see and get to them easily. I'm planning on getting another one for more shoes and, maybe some incidentals too.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Broke 15 mins out of the box. Specifically the Velcro wrap at the top that goes around your closet hanger bar. That strap is attached with 3 rivets, that popped after I put my clothes in - did not over load as you can see from photo. JUNK. Good thing I’m handy - I’ll fix it. But. Really?
customer_reviews.author: DPT

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect in my walk-in closet
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these hanging shelf organizers. I hung four in a row on top bar of my walk-in closet to store my sweaters, winter scarves and shawls. Worked perfect for me. If I see something I want, have good access to it, I am much more likely to wear it. These organizers did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M Punch

customer_reviews.title: A problem solver
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this item and I am happy with my purchase. The Container Store near me sells three- or six-shelf organizers but I'd like to get one that has 5 shelves with the right measurement for my closet. This item looked perfect to me when I found it on Amazon.com. I am pleased with the product as it feels durable and it is roomy. It fits my closet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CYN

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Shoe Storage
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is the right length for my closet. It was a bit narrower than I had expected and fits one pair of shoes in each slot. Easy to install :)
customer_reviews.author: S & N  A.

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says and is easy to use. But, I hate the color. But I knew what color it was when I ordered it. Just wanted to try one before I ordered a more expensive one in a vibrant color, which I did. But this one does hang better than the colorful pretty one!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for shoes. They are great and not ugly. For some reason my teen keeps taking all the shoes out and throwing them on the floor like there is a treasure hiding behind the cleanly obvious shoes, but I can’t expect this produce to fix him, so....
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Was happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my needs .Doesn’t take up a lot of space and yet held 8 pair of sneakers and 2 pair sandals.I was pleasantly surprised and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: These things are nice for a week then they sag. It’s literally fabric and cardboard. No support. Ends up spilling stuff everywhere. Maybe good for your feather collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small. Light duty
customer_reviews.text: Top latch is connected by button style connection. Too much weight and it will fall. Not very big on the size. I guess for holding underwear and socks this could work but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Makes kife easier
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need to separate long-sleeve from short sleeve tee shirts, arrange by colors, necklines, etc. Makes getting dressed in the A.M. (when I am not quite awake) so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room in bins. Size 8, chunky heel styles. A bit snug but if you place them properly they'll fit. Not sure about sturdiness and durability. Seems sturdy enough but just got it. We'll see over time if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it a little over a month and it broke. I didn’t even have anything really heavy on it. Poorly made. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah and Andres

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer. The only improvement you can make would be to make the top board a little bit sturdier. The one on mine seems to be bending a little and all I have in it is lightweight sweaters and cotton jersey tops. Otherwise it is perfect: well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Top part
customer_reviews.text: good construction, fits well in closet. BUT after hanging in closet, the part holding the whole thing up started coming apart. The fasteners are too small to hold any weight for the organizer. So I pulled top part off and put metal hooks in the holes are. Put back in closet and works great.Other than that I like well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing shelf-like spaces.
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfect on our closet hanger bar. It saved so much space for our kiddos clothes and whatnot. Our closet space looks so spacious now and less cluttery. The seams look sturdy enough to last until we get a real shelf. Even though it's made of fabric and foldable, it still looks good for a temporary shelf-like space.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed...easy accessibility...
customer_reviews.text: Used this item to store.. socks , underwear and t-shirts...its easier to access .... less time searching through your dresser drawers...just to realize you need to do laundry...oh one more thing the velcro is strong this organizer can hold weight...easily can fill with shoes....if you had too...well constructed...
customer_reviews.author: Mr M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold much!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO TINY!!! holds a small shoe in each pocket. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: honeybee

customer_reviews.title: good organizer
customer_reviews.text: It works! Does what it needs to do and is pictured. Velcro seems really strong. Only half of the shelf has cardboard, and towards the back it is soft. I wish the entire thing had cardboard, but no big deal. This will be used to hold undergarments and tshirts so I assume it should hold up. Time will tell :)
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this item because it claimed to be sturdy, and the materials seem to be fairly sturdy, sure. But after using it for about 2 weeks, the entire thing collapsed- the metal grommets holding it together snapped, and I'm not able to put them back together. I didn't have that much in it either.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative for plastic shelves
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of storage and space saver. It is sturdy enough to hold my towels, sheets, socks, and wash cloths. Great addition for small closets and for people that have to move frequently. It wouldn’t work to store heavy items and is a bit smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: YPatel

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Use Organizer - Durable and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I hung this organizer up in my closet and use it to store my shoes in it. It is very durable and can handle the weight. The color of the organizer is light and although the shoes may be a little dirty when they are stored it doesn't seem to stain the organizer. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. WALKER

customer_reviews.title: broke in under 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The product at looks looks roomy and sturdy....but after a month it started unsnapping from where is suspends (the hardware/clips). After it snapped i was unable to use at all. very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rod

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for limited closet space
customer_reviews.text: Excellent use of limited closet space. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Just what I needed to keep my shoes off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: As described, works well for me!
customer_reviews.text: I don't store heavy things in this organizer, just ALL my pants/jeans/athletic leggings. They do not cause the organizer to sag, and there is lots of space. Worked really well for me! Doesn't look beautiful or anything in my closet, but it does help it look neater.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution for a crowded closet
customer_reviews.text: It holds 10 pairs of large shoes and freed up so much space in my closet. The holder is sturdy and did not cave from the weight. A perfect solution for my closet.
customer_reviews.author: linda hahn

customer_reviews.title: Holds well! And alot of space
customer_reviews.text: Super spacious. For the price I paid I was expecting cheaper quality. But it's really good material and made to last. Will order more for sure! They hold alot of shoes. Pockets are super spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. It was easy to set up and has plenty of room to store different items. I use this as a school week wardrobe for my kiddos. My only complaint is that the bottom “shelf” leans forward with any kind of weight on/in it. So I have to try multiple times to get everything in just right so that they don’t come tumbling out.
customer_reviews.author: Momma^6

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This storage bag for shoes is great! Very well made and doesn't take up much room in closet. Can easily see shoes. This is definitely a 5*!
customer_reviews.author: tdjones

customer_reviews.title: These are great, and have really helped us to organize our ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and have really helped us to organize our bedroom. Before, we really had no space for an armoir or dresser, but a ton of closet space, so with these, we were able to kill two birds with one stone and finally stop leaving laundry in a basket.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. My sweaters are now organized and neatly folded - I no longer have to dig through my sweaters to find the one I want to wear - they are so easy to get to. I am so glad I bought this!!!
customer_reviews.author: kerry bartley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I have size 12 feet so one shoe goes in one slot. Gets my shoes off the floor, I am wondering how the velcro will hold over time. First few weeks I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gough

customer_reviews.title: No assembly needed.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can hang my shoes near my clothes neatly. It's not super long so it doesn't hang over my stuff that is on the floor. The only thing I can say is that I wish the spaces were a little bigger. It doesn't hold a pair of bigger shoes like pumps or my hiking boots. I have to use 2 shelves for them. Other then that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: This broke within the first 5 minutes of use. I didn't overfill it, just put some wool and cotton sweaters in it (pictured). There are 3 rivets across the top and one busted. I'm still using it for the time being, but expect the rest to break soon since the top bows so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one to sort my son’s school clothes for the week. I loved it so much I bought another one when I returned to work to plan/sort my work clothes for the week. I fit all 3 of my kids clothes in one and I put my clothes in the other one. Clothes are planned out for the week on sundays and put into the organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, convenient organization!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to keep in our front hall closet, for just my shoes:) My husband's and kids shoes all fit on the floor of the closet. I like not having to bend down and sort through the pile of shoes to find mine, and to know they are not getting dirty/damaged in the pile.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: My Second One
customer_reviews.text: This device is excellent for storing five pair of men's shoes. I now have two, since I've acquired more shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer for small bedrooms. We are using it in our travel trailer with very small wardrobes. It's great especially when used with the collapsible drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Since moving to Florida, I have lots and lots of sandals. This is perfect to keep my shoes organized and easy to find. I was able to fit more than ten pairs!
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaPace

customer_reviews.title: Just what my closet needed.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It really saves space, but if you have larger size shoes two may not fit together well. They work well for my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Nice hanging shoe organizer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace a hanging shoe organizer that was so old, it was disintegrating. It seems to be more sturdy and durable than the old one. The individual compartments are smaller than the one I had, but I think it will still work for me..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carol Lampman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for - something not too wide yet still hold a pair of size 7 tennis shoes in each slot. Bigger shoe sizes may only fit 1 shoe in each slot tho.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Good size!
customer_reviews.text: Good size cubby for space conservative areas. I am a bit worried about how long it'd be able to hold for, but so far it's good (but only has been a few weeks). It's able to hold a few sweaters, lots of boxers, lots of winter accessory.
customer_reviews.author: momobear

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: fell apart the second day didn't bother to see d it back
customer_reviews.author: karen p.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Hung it up put sandles in it down in an hour! Velcro is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sea glass

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another with three drawers. I couldn’t fit both in my closet, so I kept the one with the drawers and gave this one to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Radarchick

★ IDEAL FOR ALL TYPES OF CLOTHING; it’s convenient and adequate 5 layered shelving units offer to store different items separately with airy and spacious bins.
★ LIGHTWEIGHT BUT TOUGH; wide reinforced strong and durable. It also has added mobility with a foldable design.
★ TICKS ALL THE ECO-FRIENDLY BOXES NEEDED; in terms of material and processes.
★ IT IS SIMPLE AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE; you don’t need an expert to assemble or disband it.
